pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## bspwm auto rice [bspar]an automatice ricing script for bspwm (my dots)ONLY WORKS ON ARCH BASED DISTROS## demo[Demo](https://i.imgur.com/VBXp4yK.mp4)## Installation```pip install bspwm-auto-rice```## Usagefor help:```bspar --help```and ```bspar <command> --help```example:```bspar set --help```
